response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. It comes with a wide range of features that cater to various needs and preferences. Given its quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than $120. Considering the value it brings, I would like to offer it to you for $150. This price reflects the investment put into its development and the benefits it promises to deliver. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 150}
